doc:
Eric Emerson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Emerson 0 Eric Emerson (June 23, 1945 – May 28, 1975) was an American musician, dancer, and actor. Emerson is best known for his roles in films by pop artist Andy Warhol, and as a member of the seminal glam punk group, the Magic Tramps. Eric_Emerson ( June_23_,_1945 – May_28_,_1975 ) was an_American_musician , dancer , and actor . Emerson is_best_known for his_roles in films by pop_artist_Andy_Warhol , and as a_member of the_seminal_glam_punk_group , the_Magic_Tramps .
